author: dj_tiny
title: Excellent Stay, amazing service
text:
Stayed here last year and to be honest, I was disappointed as it was not up to the sand standard as other doubletree's we've stayed at before.
Navid the front of house manager asked us to give the hotel another go, so we did, and I'm very glad we did.
Everything about our stay was perfect. The room was lovely, clean, with a nice view of the Thames and the planes arriving at the airport. The hotel itself was lovely, but best of all was the service from the staff. They were all so helpful and willing to help whenever they could. The breakfast staff were great, making sure we had everything we needed, including a high chair for our smallest child.
But it was the reception staff that really made the difference. We had to leave the hotel early on our last morning due to me taking part in the North London Half Marathon, and although breakfast didn't start until 6.30am, Katerina made sure that we had breakfast delivered to our room for 6am.
The staff at the hotel really made our trip, and we will definatley be using the hotel again anytime we come back to London
